casebody.data:
John A. Kennedy, Jr. v. J. William Burns, Commissioner of Transportation (4698)

Borden, Hull and Daly, Js.

Argued November 12 decision released December 9, 1986 Kirk A. Bennett, for the appellant (plaintiff). Molly S. LeVan, with whom, on the brief, was Linda D. D’Albis, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by Mascagna v. Derby, 123 Conn. 684, 194 A. 728 (1937), Marino v. East Haven, 120 Conn. 577, 182 A. 225 (1935), and Zotta v. Burns, 8 Conn. App. 169, 511 A.2d 373 (1986).

There is no error.
